chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z <> nil /\ cA_1 m k z <> nil

Premises:
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else c
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
nil = 0%nat : nat
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
not_exd_A_1_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A_1 m k z = nil
not_exd_A_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A m k z = nil
succ_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z
pred_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m z
exd_not_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> z <> nil
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)
pred_exd_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m (A_1 m k z)
exd_A_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A m k z) -> exd m z
exd_A_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A_1 m k z) -> exd m z
A_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> A m k (A_1 m k z) = z
A_1_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> A_1 m k (A m k z) = z
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
A_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> A m k nil = nil
A_1_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> A_1 m k nil = nil
pred = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A_1 m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
prec_I = fun (m : fmap) (x : dart) => x <> nil /\ ~ exd m x : fmap -> dart -> Prop
succ_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {succ m k x} + {~ succ m k x}
pred_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {pred m k x} + {~ pred m k x}
not_exd_nil : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m nil
inj_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (pred m k) (A_1 m k)
inj_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (succ m k) (A m k)
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
A_1 = fix A_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (y : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A_1 m0 k y | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y0 y then x0 else A_1 m0 k y else A_1 m0 k y end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
exd_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), {exd m x} + {~ exd m x}
Z.le_neq : forall n m : Z, n < m < -> n <= m /\ n <> m
N.neq_sym : forall n m : N, n <> m -> m <> n
B_1 = fix B_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (y : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B_1 m0 k y) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y0 y then m0 else L (B_1 m0 k y) k0 x0 y0 else L (B_1 m0 k y) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap ->...-> fmap
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
not_INR : forall n m : nat, n <> m -> INR n <> INR m
Z.lt_neq : forall n m : Z, n < m -> n <> m
Record Metric_Space : Type := Build_Metric_Space { Base : Type; dist : Base -> Base -> R; dist_pos : forall x y : Base, (dist x y >= 0)%R; dist_sym : forall x y : Base, dist x y = dist y x; dist_refl : forall x y : Base, dist x y = 0%R < -> x = y; dist_tri : forall x y z : Base, (dist x y <= dist x z + dist z y)%R } For Build_Metric_Space: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
beq_nat_false : forall n m : nat, (n =? m)%nat = false -> n <> m
dist : forall m : Metric_Space, Base m -> Base m -> R
IZR = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 => R0 | Z.pos n => IPR n | Z.neg n => (- IPR n)%R end : Z -> R Argument scope is [Z_scope]
N.lt_gt_cases : forall n m : N, n <> m < -> (n < m)%N \/ (m < n)%N
VectorEq.eqb : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> bool) -> forall m n : nat, VectorDef.t A m -> VectorDef.t A n -> bool
succ_plus_discr : forall n m : nat, n <> S (m + n)
Z.succ_inj_wd_neg : forall n m : Z, Z.succ n <> Z.succ m < -> n <> m
Nat.succ_inj_wd_neg : forall n m : nat, S n <> S m < -> n <> m

```coq
intros m k z Hinv Hexd.
split.
- destruct (exd_dec m z) as [Hexd' | Hnot_exd].
  + assumption.
  + contradiction Hexd Hnot_exd.
- destruct (exd_dec m (cA m k z)) as [Hexd' | Hnot_exd'].
  + apply exd_A_exd with k z; assumption.
  + destruct (succ_dec m k z) as [Hsucc | Hnot_succ].
    * apply succ_exd_A with k z; assumption.
    * apply pred_exd_A_1 with k z; assumption.
Qed.
